OCD.name: WebConsole
OCD.description: Web Console configuration. A change to this view will case the reload of the web server! Spurious error messages can be displayed during the restart.

AD.name: Console Password
AD.description: Device's web console password. A non empty value should be set.

AD.name: Web Server Entry Point
AD.description: Default Web Server Entry Point for Applications running on the framework's Web Server

AD.name: Session max inactivity interval
AD.description: The session max inactivity interval in minutes. If no interaction with the Web UI is performed for the value of this parameter in minutes, a new login will be requested.

AD.name: Access Banner Enabled
AD.description: Enables or disables the displaying of a customizable banner at user login.

AD.name: Access Banner Content
AD.description: Access banner content. To be displayed at every user access, if the feature is enabled.|TextArea

AD.name: Minimum password length
AD.description: The minimum length to be enforced for new passwords. Set to 0 to disable.

AD.name: Require digits in new password
AD.description: If set to true, new passwords will be accepted only if containing at least one digit.

AD.name: Require special characters in new password
AD.description: If set to true, new passwords will be accepted only if containing at least one non alphanumeric character.

AD.name: Require uppercase and lowercase characters in new passwords
AD.description: If set to true, new passwords will be accepted only if containing both uppercase and lowercase alphanumeric characters.
